item.description:
January - The 7 Hills Camera Club always meets at 6 Institute Road (Merriman Hall, United Congregational Church) and meeting start at 7:00 PM.

Guest Speakers

The 7 Hills Camera Club has asked Scott Erb and his wife, Donna Dufault, to come in and talk about his new book, 20 Artists of Worcester. The project was funded by a grant from the Worcester Cultural Commission and we've asked Scott and Donna to talk about all aspects of this project, from the grant process to working with the artists to the issues associated with creating a book. This should be a very informational evening. Many of us have already seen and enjoyed Scott's and Donna's work as photographers and, we hope, They'll be showing some images from the book to go along with the lecture.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the folks with the Camera

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: "20 Artists Book Project" Lecture at the 7 Hills Camera Club
